answers.answer: How far along are you? And did you eat or drink anything before the test? Because it being high even before drinking it can of course indicate gestational diabetes, but the 2nd test will tell you for sure. Did they mention being worried about your BP being high? They may monitor that as well.

Hey im 24 wk and 4days, no I didnt eat they told me ntg.after midnight so I ate ntg!! And no they didnt say if they would monitor the bp or not but im guessing once I do the other test they'll tell me more
My np has been high at every ob apt ive had and I'm on my 3rd kid. Had to do the 3 hr test with one. I was negative.

question: So I went to my appt this morning for the glucose test.and omce she pricked my finger to.check my sugar she.said it was high already so they didnt make me drink the stuff for the test, but now I have to go have a 3hr gtt study, so do yall think that means ill have  gestational diabestes and my bp was high this is the 3rd visit with me blood pressure being high...any thought on my situation :)
title: glucose test
